channel.title: Need working Runserver.bat!
channel.description:
Yea, my compiler runs my server cuz i cant seem to type up a working runserver.bat.
Why do I need a runserver.bat? becuase every like 10 hours my server logs every1 out and says "This user is already online" until i exit the server and open it.
Two problems with this 1. my server will never stay 100% this way, meaning not many people will come 2. It pisses me off
I got a Vista Restarter already, but my runserver.bat doesn't work
If some1 would just please give me their code for their runserver.bat ( if it is a working 1 =) )that would be lovely =)

item.title: Need working Runserver.bat!

Err so what ur saying is it will run but u cant seee it?

You need a runserver.bat to run your server.

item.title: Need working Runserver.bat!
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Jp Owner Jp
item.description:
@Owner_Jp wrote:

Thecheeseman, Go into you’re antilag.java and change the Resettimer: 99999 to 3000 (every 50 mins) This Will reset server every 50 mins.

Read full topic

item.title: Need working Runserver.bat!
item.dc:creator: @Hobo_JO Hobo JO
item.description:
@Hobo_JO wrote:

try this

@echo off
color 0a
title Blainescape
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 18, 2008, 02:54:54 PM[/size][hr]did that help?

Read full topic
